General.Name: Trellidor Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Trellidor Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and distributes custom-made barrier security products primarily in South Africa, the United Kingdom, and Ghana. It operates through Trellidor and Taylor segments. Trellidor segment engages in manufacture and distribution of custom-made barrier security products. Taylor segments provides custom-made blinds, decorative and security shutters, and cornicing/skirting products. The company offers retractable and fixed security gates, burglar and clear guards, roller style shutters, cottage guards, and polycarbonate bar products for doors, windows, patios, safe rooms, offices, and estates, as well as retail properties. It sells its products through a network of franchises. The company was formerly known as Trellicor Holding Proprietary Limited and changed its name to Trellidor Holdings Limited in September 2015. Trellidor Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1970 and is headquartered in Durban, South Africa.

3.Name: Ms. Paula  Nel B.Com., B.Comm, BCom, FCIS
